version_description: Fix minor bug, iPad support, Add calendar tracking & iCloud backup
Issued Fixed: The users currently working in the advanced level can work for free without in-app purchase.
Fix minor bug and crash issue.
Fix crashes
Fix crash on iOS 10

- We made it easier for you to be on track with your workouts.
- Refreshed the user interface.
- Fixed minor issues.
- Stability improvements.
- Minor bug fixes

If you have stopped working out, this update is a great reminder that you should get back into it and carry on! If you haven’t, it is a great reminder that you are a badass! In any case, stay healthy and enjoy our new update!

Happy holidays! Let's get ready for the New Year with the brand new 30DayFitness with a beautiful new UI, killer workouts, and HD videos with professional personal trainers.
You asked and we delivered: you can now listen to music while working out. Enjoy!
We fixed a couple of minor issues to improve your overall experience. Keep pushing!

Hello sporty!
It's Christmas time and we've got a gift for you!
This is a big update which brings a new refined design to the app so that it is more modern and polished.
We have improved the navigation of the plan and added new features! You can now preview your plan in the future and look back at the old weeks. Did you forget to mark an old workout as complete? Do you need to reschedule a workout to another day? We've got you covered!
Go and check it out!
Share your experience on Instagram @30dayfitness and let us know what you think about the improvements to 30dayfitness@bendingspoons.com

Hello sporty!
In this update we just added a few bug fixes! Keep working out and follow us on Instagram @thirtydayfitnessapp.
Stay fit and be happy!

In this update we just added a few bug fixes! Keep working out and follow us on Instagram @thirtydayfitnessapp.

Follow us on Instagram @thirtydayfitnessapp. Like to share your workout routine on your Instagram stories? Add our branded GIFs then! Search for #30df on GIPHY. Stay fit, we love you.

Hello sporty!

Your workout results keep us rolling - we are so proud to see you guys enjoying the app. This time we’ve fixed a small bug and polished the app a little. We also really appreciate your feedback - we need to know how to make 30 Day Fitness better.

Stay happy and hydrated,
With love,
30DF team

Hi sporty!
Are you on your Bikini body challenge? Or did you start your personal plan? Either way, we’ve fixed a few bugs to make sure nothing can stop you from your next workout! GO&ROCK ITTTT

Hey!
How was your workout today? We have a small performance improvement for you!
We are also constantly working to make the app better, so if you have any suggestions let us know at 30dayfitness@bendingspoons.com
With love and motivation,
30DF team

Here's our new update with quite a few improvements:
- We introduced a new workout level (with 80 professional workouts) to better match the needs of those who really just start their workout journey now.
- Workouts are more customisable than ever, you can swap the exercises of a workout.
- You can restore your workout if for some reason you have to close the app while working out.
- The fitness plan has been fine-tuned and now it follows your progression even more naturally.
- Smart reminders will help you keep on track.
We fixed a couple of minor issues to improve your overall experience. Keep pushing!

Here's our new update with quite a few improvements:
- We introduced a new workout level (with 80 professional workouts) to better match the needs of those who really just start their workout journey now.
- Workouts are more customisable than ever, you can swap the exercises of a workout.
- You can restore your workout if for some reason you have to close the app while working out.
- The fitness plan has been fine-tuned and now it follows your progression even more naturally.
- Smart reminders will help you keep on track.

For technical reasons, we will no longer support iOS9 or older. To download the latest version from the App Store, make sure your device is updated to at least iOS 10.

If you are enjoying our app, please take a minute to rate us in the App Store. Your feedback keeps us moving!

Here's a new update for you with stability improvements.

If you are enjoying our app, please take a minute to rate us in the App Store. Your feedback keeps us moving!

Hello sporty! Hope you don't skip your workouts, stay hydrated and shine as always.
To make your 30 Day Fitness experience even more enjoyable, we've introduced some really cool features for those of you who love chatting with Siri! If you work out regularly, you will soon receive some handy Shortcuts from your personal assistant to start your workout immediately at your usual preferred time. How cool is that?
Pssst! Hey Siri, ask your human to leave us a review!

Hello sporty! It's us again! With this version, we are fixing some crashes that were occurring at launch to some of you! Now, you can enjoy your workouts even more and without nasty bugs bothering you anymore! Stay hydrated and keep shining!

Hello sporty! In this update we deliver some UI improvements, some of them you can find pretty useful.
Feeling that you can do more? Adjust the difficulty level right in your profile, level up your workout game!
Overestimated yourself and the workouts are way too difficult? Just go and adjust the difficulty level in your profile. We won’t tell anyone - pinky promise!
Follow us on Instagram @thirtydayfitnessapp. Like to share your workout routine on your Instagram stories? Add our branded GIFs then! Search for #30df on GIPHY.

Stay fit, we love you.

Hello sporty! In this update we just added a few bug fixes to make the app even better!

Follow us on Instagram @thirtydayfitnessapp. Like to share your workout routine on your Instagram stories? Add our branded GIFs then! Search for #30df on GIPHY. Stay fit, we love you.

Hello sporty!
Here's our deal:
ON US:
-Develop and hand craft the best fitness app the world has ever seen (DONE)
-Release the new app update with some performance improvements, while you thought we've already reached the absolute perfection, we are still hungry for more (DONE)

ON YOU:
-DO YOUR TODAY'S WORKOUT! COME OOOON!
-Leave a review to let us know what else we can improve for you (we know it's almost impossible cause our app is just the definition of perfection, but we challenge you)
-Call your mum, I bet she misses you.

Do you like to share your workout routine on your Instagram stories? Follow @thirtydayfitnessapp and add our branded GIFs! Search for #30df on GIF Instagram sticker, create your story-masterpiece, get reposted and join the community of 70K+ sport addicts.

Stay hydrated,
With love,
30DF team.

Hello sporty!
Your workout results keep us rolling - we are so proud to see you guys enjoying the app. We also really appreciate your feedback - we need to know how to make 30 Day Fitness better. This time we’ve fixed the bug in the challenges that you’ve found - now you can easily move to the next days of your workout challenge!
Some great updates are coming in the next release as well - meanwhile we’ve implemented some support for an awesome feature that you’ll meet soon. But we won’t tell you about it now, it’s a secret, shhh!

Stay happy and hydrated,
With love,
30DF team

Ciao sporty!
New Year is coming, you wanna step in 2019 flawless and perfect, don’t you? Then start our 30 Day Fitness Challenge now and impress everybody at the Christmass party not only with your outfit. To help you with that, we’ve fixed some bugs and polished the app to perfection. No excuses. Your call, what are you waiting for?

With love and motivation,
30DF team

Hello sporty! In this update we just added a few bug fixes to make the app even better. We hope that you're getting ready for the new year. No excuses!

Follow us on Instagram @thirtydayfitnessapp. Like to share your workout routine on your Instagram stories? Add our branded GIFs then! Search for #30df on GIPHY. Stay fit, we love you!

Bugs are fixed, bugs are fixed,
No bugs all the way,
Oh what fun it is to use
An app with no delay!

Well, that’s our very last update of 2018. We wish you a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year, guys.
Take care, see you in 2019!

The new year is here, and that doesn't just come with a new You, but it comes with a brand new 30 Day Fitness as well. Start 2020 strong. Work out anywhere, anytime. Lose weight, gain muscle, or just stay fit and healthy, and live the life you have always wanted.
Share your experience on Instagram @30dayfitness and let us know what you think about the improvements at 30dayfitness@bendingspoons.com.

We’ve taken care of a couple of bugs to give you the experience you deserve. If you’re going to be your best selves, then we need to be OUR best selves.

Thanks for using 30 Day Fitness!

Keep crushing it,
Team 30DF

Hey there, fitness fans!

Don’t mind us—just a few little tweaks and improvements to help you get more from the app.

Thanks for using 30 Day Fitness!

Keep crushing it,
Team 30DF

P.S. Want extra motivation? Follow @thirtydayfitnessapp on Instagram.

Hey there, fitness fans!

From now on you will be able to control you workouts with voice commands. You don't need to reach for your phone to move on to the next exercise while working out. Those times are gone. You can simply say "Next", "Back", "Play", and "Pause". We'll do the rest.

Keep crushing it,
Team 30DF

P.S. Want extra motivation? Follow @30dayfitness on Instagram.

Hey there, fitness fans!

We heard your feedback, and we worked hard to bring you a few improvements.

From now on you will have complete freedom when you want to replace an exercise in your workouts. Is there an exercise that you can't do or you simply don't like it? Blacklist it!

You will also be able to reset your challenges, preview future workouts, and see more information about the workouts before starting them.

Keep crushing it,
Team 30DF

P.S. Want extra motivation? Follow @30dayfitness on Instagram.

Hi, sporty!
You know what bugs us? Little bugs in our apps. In this update we fixed the one that disconnected your Bluetooth devices while using the app. Now you can use your headphones and speakers again while working out!
Thanks for using 30 Day Fitness!
Keep crushing it,
Team 30DF
